questions.question: How quickly will I receive my dummy ticket?
questions.answer: Most dummy tickets are delivered within 5-30 minutes after payment confirmation.

questions.question: Are your dummy tickets verifiable?
questions.answer: Yes, all our tickets come with valid PNR codes that can be verified on airline websites.

questions.question: What payment methods do you accept?
questions.answer: We accept credit/debit cards, PayPal, and various international payment methods.

questions.question: Can I make changes to my booking?
questions.answer: Yes, we allow up to 4 changes to your booking details free of charge.
